title: Shannon Matthews' stepdad jailed over child sex abuse material pictured for first time since youngster's fake kidnap
text:
News Shannon Matthews' stepdad jailed over child sex abuse material pictured for first time since youngster's fake kidnap Craig Meehan, who has a new name, was strolling this week just two miles from where Shannon was found in 2008 Share Craig Meehan in Batley, Yorkshire, this week near where Shannon Matthews was found after her "kidnapping" in 2008 (Photo: The People) Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
The stepdad of Shannon Matthews has been pictured for the first time since she was found. 
Craig Meehan, the ex-boyfriend of Shannon’s mum Karen Matthews , was this week seen walking with another woman to shops near his new home. 
Strolling just two miles from where Shannon was found, he bought groceries and a case of lager, picked up Lotto scratchcards from a newsagent then headed into a bookmaker’s, the Sunday People can reveal. 
The ex-fishmonger, now 30 and with a new name, is portrayed in the film but had no part in the fake abduction. Craig Meehan is portrayed in the new TV drama but had no part in the fake abduction (Photo: The People) Craig Meehan just two miles from where Shannon was found (Photo: The People) 
He was jailed for 20 weeks after police found child sex abuse material on his computer. 
The pictures have emerged ahead of the BBC1 's new drama about the fake kidnap of Shannon. 
The show is called The Moorside after the housing estate in Dewsbury, West Yorks, where the real-life drama unfolded in February 2008. Karen Matthews with Craig Meehan in 2008 (Photo: REUTERS/Nigel Roddis) 
A huge police operation was launched when nine-year-old Shannon failed to return home from a school swimming trip. 
Matthews, now 41, made emotional TV appeals for the return of her daughter which led to a £50,000 reward being put up. 
The local community pulled together to raise publicity in the desperate search for the youngster. Read More Craig Meehan was jailed for 20 weeks after police found child porn on his computer (Photo: The People) Read More Shannon Matthews kidnap: The harrowing true story behind The Moorside BBC drama 
But after almost a month, the charade began to fall apart and Matthews confessed she had arranged for her daughter to be kidnapped to get the reward money for “finding” her. 
Shannon was discovered drugged and imprisoned in the base of a divan bed less than a mile away at the flat of Michael Donovan. 
He is the uncle of Craig, who was Matthews’ boyfriend at the time. 
Matthews and Donovan, now 49, were jailed for eight years for kidnap, false imprisonment and perverting the course of justice. Like us on Facebook
